pullrequest.title: parallelize position projection error correction with threads

content.raw: This PR probably deserves an entry in the Changelog. From past experiences, changing the behaviour of the physic engine could end up on user problems trying to get the same physics across gazebo versions. The entry in the changelog could help to locate the source of the changes.
content.html: This PR probably deserves an entry in the Changelog. From past experiences, changing the behaviour of the physic engine could end up on user problems trying to get the same physics across gazebo versions. The entry in the changelog could help to locate the source of the changes.
